snippet: Jeff Bezos’s willingness to finance hiring new employees has created an atmosphere of confidence and financial stability supported by strong journalistic leadership.
abstract: David Carr The Media Equation observes once-embattled Washington Post is in middle of a great run, turning out the kind of reporting that journalists, and readers, live for; points out owner Jeff Bezos’s willingness to finance hiring new employees--over 100 so far in 2014--has created an atmosphere of confidence and financial stability supported by strong journalistic leadership.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Bezos’s willingness to finance hiring new employees has created an atmosphere of confidence and financial stability supported by strong journalistic leadership.

headline.main: The Washington Post Regains Its Place at the Table
headline.print_headline: Post Regains Its Place at the Table
